column2: comment_content:"大落地窗非常棒，景色怡人"
column3: comment_title:"\n                            簡潔、安靜、風景美、裝潢設計有個性\n                        "}

column2: comment_content:"面向大海，交通方便，裝潢特色"
comment_content:"酒店很新，装潢很美式，房间一般大，海景最无敌"
comment_content:"This is a nice hotel near the beach.  The positives are that the hotel is new and the quality of fixtures and materials is good.  The negatives are that the room I had is small
column3: the bathroom is Asian style meaning an open shower
column4: and you need to walk at least 30 minutes to the main drag with all the nightlife."
